nodes.text: The Class-4T3 power generator was a power generator manufactured by Eksoan, and used to power E-Web heavy repeating blaster cannons. It had a tendency to overheat if it wasn't watched closely, especially if it was used to support the infantry. It needed to be charged in advance, as its commissioning took up to 15 minutes.

The Class-4T3 power generator was first mentioned in the Imperial Sourcebook, a Star Wars Legends sourcebook for West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, released in October 1989. The Class-4T3 power generator was first named in the new Star Wars Canon in Altaya's Blasters and Firearms reference book, released exclusively in France on February 23, 2021.
